summary: VEHICLE WAS PARKED IN FRONT OF A HOUSE .   I LEFT THE VEHICLE IN 1ST GEAR THEN SET THE PARKING BRAKE AND TURNED THE WHEELS INTO THE CURB TO PREVENT ROLL BACK AND I GOT OUT OF THE VEHICLE.  I WENT INSIDE AND THE VEHICLE ROLLED DOWN A HILL AND INTO A HOUSE.  WHEN THE POLICE CAME THEY FOUND IT STILL IN GEAR AND THE EMERGENCY BRAKE WAS STILL ON .  *TR
